name: 朱丽安娜·古尔
name_full: 朱丽安娜·古尔 Julianna Guill

introduction:
"Overview (3)
Date of Birth	7 July 1987, Winston-Salem, North Carolina, USA
Birth Name	Julianna Minetree Guill
Height	 5' 4½" (1.64 m)
Mini Bio (1)
Julianna Guill was born on July 7, 1987 in Winston-Salem, North Carolina, USA as Julianna Minetree Guill. She is best known for her role as Bree in the 2009 film Friday the 13th (2009) and Scarlet Haukkson in the webisode series My Alibi (2008). She also co-starred in the TBS series Glory Daze (2010) as Christie Dewitt. Julianna Guill is one of three children who all grew up singing and acting. She was born in Winston-Salem, North Carolina to parents Ann and Earl Guill. She began tap, ballet and jazz dance at an early age, and continued singing in the choir while at R.J. Reynolds High School, from which she graduated in 2005. She also performed in local theater productions, and attended New York University before moving to Los Angeles. Guill has made numerous guest appearances in television series such as One Tree Hill, CSI: Miami, 90210, How I Met Your Mother and CSI: Crime Scene Investigation. She also had regular roles in the web television series My Alibi (2008) and the TBS series Glory Daze (2010). In 2009, she appeared in the independent teen comedy film Costa Rican Summer (2010) which was released on July 16, 2009. Guill also had small roles in the Brian Drolet film 2 Dudes and a Dream (2009) and Fired Up! (2009)."
